text: بَلِ ٱدَّٰرَكَ عِلْمُهُمْ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّ مِّنْهَا ۖ بَلْ هُم مِّنْهَا عَمُونَ

translation.en.sahih: Rather, their knowledge is arrested concerning the Hereafter. Rather, they are in doubt about it. Rather, they are, concerning it, blind.
translation.id.indonesian: Sebenarnya pengetahuan mereka tentang akhirat tidak sampai (kesana) malahan mereka ragu-ragu tentang akhirat itu, lebih-lebih lagi mereka buta daripadanya.
